## FAIR4RS

All these actions have helped us to adhere to the FAIR4RS principles and helped us manage a large software project with a small team.

* Findable
* Accessible
* Interoperable
* Reusable
<!---
 * Findable & Unique identifier for each version
    + TopoStats is now versioned with proper nomenclature & metadata in the repo
* Accessible
    + Open Source on GitHub, Code is routinely submitted to ORDA for perpetual access.
* Interoperable
    + Use of standard formats and systems.
* Reusable
    + Documentation, detailled information on context and dependencies. 
--->
